item.title: ABC News Youtube Comment Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Critical Research Analysis Research Paper Code thisisthestartofsummary For a university assignment I scraped comments across several of Australiaâ€™s ABC News YouTube channel videos and performed sentiment analysis on said data. Firstly, I wrote a critical analysis paper in which I describe the dynamics of YouTube and other social media scraping, sentiment analysis and authorship attribution using academic research and other resources. This paper can be found here. Secondly, I wrote a paper based on the exploration of the scraped data and its sentiment (which was calculated using SentiStrength.
